author: Joe B
text:
Hello-
I am working on some research for a university project analyzing Private vs Public EMS systems.  I saw some dated documentation (from 2003) that referenced a ICMA report which surveyed municipalities and counties to understand how the EMS services are provided.
I struggled to find a more recent document.  Can anyone point me in the direction of some relevant documentation or studies that the ICMA has performed?
Thanks in advance for your help.
Joe
title: EMS: Market breakdown of Private vs Public
